content: skill level easy level 2 size 9-12 months 2-3 years finished circumference 21 21 in 53 \ 53\ cm at neck edge finished length 12 15 in 38 \ 49 5 cm poncho will lengthen when worn homespun® article #790 1 2 balls crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm stitch markers large-eye blunt needles gauge 3 blocks 3-double_crochet + 4 row = 4 in 10 cm in block pattern poncho is worked in rounds beginning at the neck in a pattern of 3-double_crochet blocks edging is worked around neck edge of completed poncho construction schematics are provided available in different colorways l0078ad 1 2009 *790-416 coral reef* l0078b 2 2009 *790-424 seafoam* *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/l0078ad html 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-baby-poncho-5
